name.name: Name
name.description: A friendly name for the menu

retries.name: Retries
retries.description: The number of times a menu should be played until a valid entry is collected

max_extension_length.name: Max Extension Length
max_extension_length.description: The maximum number of digits that can be collected

record_pin.name: Record Pin
record_pin.description: The pin number used to record the menu prompt

allow_record_from_offnet.name: Allow Record From Offnet
allow_record_from_offnet.description: Determines if the record pin can be used by external calls

hunt.name: Hunt
hunt.description: Determines if the callers can dial internal extensions directly

greeting.name: Greeting
greeting.description: The ID of a media object that should be used as the menu greeting

transfer_media.name: Transfert Media
transfer_media.description: When a call is transfered from the menu, either after all retries exhausted or a successful hunt, this media can be played

exit_media.name: Exit Media
exit_media.description: When a call is transfered from the menu after all retries exhausted this media can be played (prior to transfer if enabled)

invalid_media.name: Invalid Media
invalid_media.description: When the collected digits dont result in a match or hunt this media can be played
